tool_description: Monitors inventory levels and generates alerts for low stock, overstock, expiring items, and other inventory threshold conditions.

alert_types.description: Types of alerts to check: low_stock, overstock, expiring, damaged, missing

low_stock_threshold.description: Minimum quantity threshold for low stock alerts

expiry_warning_days.description: Days before expiry to trigger warning alerts

sku_filter.description: Specific SKUs to monitor (empty means all SKUs)

error_messages: Invalid alert_types: Must contain only [low_stock, overstock, expiring, damaged, missing].
Invalid thresholds: low_stock_threshold must be positive integer, expiry_warning_days must be between 1-90.
Unknown SKUs: One or more SKUs in sku_filter do not exist in inventory system.
No alert types specified: At least one alert type must be provided.
usage: Provide alert_types array to specify which conditions to monitor. Optionally set thresholds and sku_filter to customize monitoring scope.

active_alerts.description: List of current active alerts with SKU and alert details

alert_summary.description: Summary of alert counts by type

priority_actions.description: Recommended priority actions to address alerts
